body:
Hi Mark,


You can always experiment with smaller and smaller values of the -ds  
parameter, but I found that the convergence doesn't change much after  
-ds 0.1.  The size of the scene doesn't affect what -ds value will work.


Using an illum would not help in this case, as far as I can figure.


-Greg
